00020 point point::offsetRect(float ox, float oy)
00021 {
00022         return point(x+ox,y+oy);

00025 point point::offsetPolar(CL_Angle heading, float distance)
00026 {
00027         return point(x - distance * sin(-heading.to_radians()),y - distance * cos(-heading.to_radians()));
00028 }

00030 float point::angleTo(point p)
00031 {
00032         return atan2(p.y,p.x) - atan2(y,x);
00033 }
00034 
00035 void point::normalize()
00036 {
00037         float length = vectorSize();
00038         x /= length;
00039         y /= length;
00040 }

00042 std::string point::toString()
00043 {
00044         return boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(x) + "," + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(y);
00045 }

00047 float SL::point::vectorSize()
00048 {
00049         return sqrtf(x*x + y*y);        
00050 }

00053 {
00054         return point(x + right.x,y+ right.y);

00058 {
00059         return point(x - right.x,y- right.y);
